price: Dan (ingatlah) Ibrahim, ketika dia berkata kepada kaumnya, "Sembahlah Allah dan bertakwalah kepada-Nya. Yang demikian itu lebih baik bagimu, jika kamu mengetahui.
arabic: وَإِبۡرَٰهِيمَ إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُۖ ذَٰلِكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ib'rāhīma idh qāla liqawmihi uʿ'budū al-laha wa-ittaqūhu dhālikum khayrun lakum in kuntum taʿlamūna
